I tried to implement the following approach:
const TableFilter = customFilter ?? Filter

return (<div> 
  <TableFilter
      ...

This way the customFilter has access to all props the Filter component receives. This caused a problem where the filter input value got removed after submitting the filter. I tried to fix the problem with useCallback / useMemo, but due to the dependency chain, I would have to split up the pagination state of every component which uses the DataTable with a customFilter.
